meanings.sent1: She is the danciest girl in our class.
meanings.sent2: The ballerina looked the danciest in her sparkling tutu.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to copy her danciest moves, but ended up looking silly.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was the danciest thing about her, lighting up the room.
meanings.sent5: The danciest song played, and everyone couldn't resist tapping their feet.

meanings.sent1: Out of all the dancers, she was the danciest.
meanings.sent2: The music made her feel danciest when she twirled around the room.
meanings.sent3: The danciest cat in the neighborhood always entertained the kids with its moves.
meanings.sent4: Her steps were danciest when she danced under the starry sky.
meanings.sent5: The danciest dress she wore flowed elegantly as she moved on the dance floor.
